result.markdown:
Question
========
When uploading lecture materials, which file format ensures easy access across all devices?

Answerlist
----------
* .pdf  
* .md 
* .pptx 
* .zip

Solution
========
**.pdf** and *.md* files preserve formatting and can be viewed on all devices without compatibility issues.
